attributes.action: Inform Nicholas Witchell that reading into the actions of a 9 month old baby and reporting it isn't a proper job for a grown man.
attributes.additional_details:
Does the BBC really need to send a 'journalist' half way around the world so that he can comment on how a 9 month old baby is enjoying a visit to Australia?

Please keep Nicholas Witchell off our screens until he has real news to report

rejection.details: This needs to be addressed to the BBC.
